title: Bug 44164 - Update needed in javadoc for constructor Image(Device , ImageData)
description: Bug 44164 - Update needed in javadoc for constructor Image(Device , ImageData). The issue arises in the constructor's usage within the provided code snippet. Import org.eclipse.swt.widgets. Public class TestImageInvalidImage {public static void main(String[] args) {ImageData data = new ImageData(10, 10, 1, new PaletteData(0xff0000, 0x00ff00, 0x0000ff)); Image image = new Image(Display.getDefault(), data); // image.dispose();}}
OB: The code snippet triggers an exception when attempting to create an Image object using the provided constructor.
EB: The javadoc for the constructor Image(Device , ImageData) should explicitly mention any constraints, requirements, or potential exceptions related to its usage, particularly in handling invalid or incompatible ImageData instances.
SR: To reproduce the issue, import org.eclipse.swt.graphics and execute the provided code snippet. Note that while the ImageData creation is successful, attempting to create an Image using the constructor results in an exception being thrown.
